snippet: The money, to support Senator Ted Cruz’s presidential campaign, could upend expectations in the race for the Republican nomination and rewrite the political rule book for outside spending.
abstract: Network of four super PACs sharing variations of name 'Keep the Promise' announces it has raised $31 million to support Sen Ted Cruz's presidential campaign; organizations were formed, and gathered the contributions, in matter of days, shocking establishment; outsize sum, which remains unverified, could upend expectations in race for Republican presidential nomination.
lead_paragraph: The money, to support Senator Ted Cruz’s presidential campaign, could upend expectations in the race for the Republican nomination and rewrite the political rule book for outside spending.

headline.main: Network of ‘Super PACs’ Says That It Has Raised $31 Million for Ted Cruz Bid
headline.print_headline: Network of ‘Super PACs’ Says That It Has Raised $31 Million for Cruz Effort
